feedback.Physical Object: Included — A bounded, discrete object with defined physical form.
feedback.Synthetic: Included — Manufactured using human-made materials (fabric, stitching).
feedback.Biological/Biomimetic: Excluded — Not derived from biological sources or inspired by biology.
feedback.Powered: Excluded — Does not rely on an external energy supply.
feedback.Structural: Included — Used to create barriers or add physical weight for resistance or support.
feedback.Physical Medium: Included — Made of physical matter (sand and bag) and occupies space.
feedback.Active: Excluded — Exhibits no self-initiated behavior or internal transformation.
feedback.Intentionally Designed: Included — Specifically made to serve as a physical counterweight, barrier, or tool.
feedback.Outputs Effect: Excluded — Does not emit energy or signal.
feedback.Processes Signals/Logic: Excluded — No informational or logical function.
feedback.State-Transforming: Excluded — No built-in state change occurs during its use.
feedback.Human-Interactive: Included — Designed to be carried, placed, and adjusted by people.
feedback.System-integrated: Excluded — Can be used within systems (e.g., levees), but not inherently system-bound.
feedback.Functionally Autonomous: Excluded — Passive and requires human placement/use.
feedback.System-Essential: Excluded — Not indispensable to any singular system identity.
feedback.Signalling: Excluded — Does not convey messages or information.
feedback.Rule-governed: Excluded — No abstract rules structure its identity.
feedback.Compositional: Excluded — Not a structured abstraction with modular components.
feedback.Normative: Excluded — Does not prescribe or direct behavior.
feedback.Temporal: Excluded — Not defined by time-dependent sequences.
feedback.Social Construct: Excluded — Exists materially, regardless of interpretation.
feedback.Institutionally Defined: Excluded — Not officially categorized or defined by institutions.
feedback.Identity-Linked: Excluded — Not associated with personal or social identity.
feedback.Regulated: Excluded — Not subject to legal or procedural regulation in its form.
feedback.Economically Significant: Excluded — Holds minimal intrinsic economic value.
feedback.Politicised: Excluded — Contextual use may be political, but the object itself is not.
feedback.Ritualised: Excluded — Not used in formalized or traditional rituals.
feedback.Ethically Significant: Excluded — Does not carry intrinsic moral implications.

encoding_notes: This encoding considers the sandbag as a functional, passive, human-designed object. Abstract and social traits are excluded as non-intrinsic. Interaction is recognized as physical manipulation intentionally built into its use.
